description.value:
Servo-Skull designed to aid user in combat and defend them. Can either be a Combat Skull (Melee Specialty) or a Gun Skull (Ranged Focus)

Requirements

See Bestiary or Inquisitor's Handbook Page 144 Combat Skull: 1750, Gun Skull: 2000 (gun bought seperately)

Effect: Rare

Notes: Varies T
